product information:
Made for people who want to upgrade their computer systems, this 17-inch Sony DELUXEPRO monitor is full-featured and modern. Researchers and analysts alike relish the capacity, sharpness, and controls of the Sony SDM-X73. This Sony DELUXEPRO monitor includes an excellent 1280 x 1024 resolution, therefore you can benefit from clearer digital photos, video games, and email messages. The detailed advanced image technology included with this flat-panel LCD TFT monitor enables you to enjoy its excellent space economy and its reduced footprint. The Sony SDM-X73 helps you to stave off all the messy cables for separate speakers thanks to its high-quality built-in speakers. This Sony DELUXEPRO monitor helps you to take advantage of the ample screen size and expand the field of view in your virtual world with its exceptional mid-sized display. With its gray body, this flat-panel LCD TFT monitor is a classic addition to any computer system. Also, the effective controls found on the Sony SDM-X73 allow you to quickly set the color balance, contrast, and aspect ratio the way you want it.
